mapper.select: SELECT B_NO, REF, STEP, B_LEVEL, NAME, SUBJ, HIT, TO_CHAR (REGIDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') REGIDATE, NEWCONTENTS FROM TESTBOARD WHERE B_NO = #{b_no}
SELECT NVL(MAX(REF)+1,'1') AS REF FROM TESTBOARD
mapper.update: UPDATE TESTBOARD SET NAME = #{name}, SUBJ = #{subj}, NEWCONTENTS = #{newcontents}, REGIDATE = SYSDATE WHERE B_NO = #{b_no}
UPDATE TESTBOARD SET STEP = STEP+1 WHERE REF = #{ref} AND STEP > #{step}
mapper.select: SELECT DECODE(#{step},'0',(MAX(STEP)+1),#{step}+1) AS STEP FROM TESTBOARD WHERE REF = #{ref}
